songs.title: Tired of Asking
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You ever felt like you ain’t being heard?
Like the whole world’s deaf and can’t understand a word?
When you speak what you feel when you ask how to deal?
But nobody has the time to listen and be real
Now you’re mad and upset cause of all of the neglect
Got you sittin home all alone waiting to eject
On this life that you live cause you can’t take it serious
Everybody’s bitchin and it’s makin you delirious
Now you feel it’s time to take it out on somebody
Their pain ends up being your stress release party
I’m tired of searching for help, don’t want these cards I was dealt
So if I want it I’ma get it myself
And I ain’t leaving till I’m satisfied, break me off
Keep it even, motherfucker, or you will get tossed
And if anybody ever tries to take my half
I’ll respond first and ask questions last
I’m tired of asking

[Chorus]
Tired of asking [x3]
Now it’s time to take what’s mine
So gimmie gimmie gimmie what’s mine
Now gimmie gimmie gimmie [x2]

[Verse 2: Anybody Killa]
I like to think I’m in control of this journey I’m on
If I ain’t getting what I need, then you’re doing me wrong
Kind of upsetting, it’ll make you want to take it
Vocalize what you thinking to the ones that always fake it
Send em home to they momma with a gravestone
All curled up cause they had a weak backbone
I think I’m losing it, y’all
It is me or does the whole world seem pissed off?
It’s time to change my views of reality
Life is what you make it so I hope nobody’s mad at me
People go crazy when there’s something that they need
And the only thing you see is a world full of greed
And I don’t think that we’re here to have to struggle
Where everyday is turned into a hustle
S-S-S-Sure I said it before and I’ll say it again
That I’ma get mine until the very end
So watch me

[Hook]

[Verse 3]
I’m tired of askin, time keeps passin
Sick of lookin like I’m constantly harassin
So gimmie gimmie or I’m grabbin, gotta get it for the havin
Ain’t slackin when I’m attackin, no more braggin
Taking what ain’t yours and thinking you safe
But you ain’t safe that’s why you always hiding your face
If you ever started hating me I really don’t care
I just got tired of asking for my fair share
I’ma get mine so go get yours
Only thing stopping you is opening new doors
Don’t hold yourself back stop askin and take it
Ain’t no charging it to the game if you tryin to make it
Keep a bird’s eye view on the road you choose
When you walking through this life without tryin to lose
So if I come huntin then I’m coming blastin
That’s why I’m known as a Killa cause I’m tired of asking
(Tired of asking)

[Hook x4]
